title: Visor Finance Liquidity Migration - Motion
body:
With Uniswap v3 now [live](https://uniswap.org/blog/uniswap-v3/), it is time to talk about ways to take advantage of the new features and opportunities it offers the mStableDAO.

Today, [5k MTA are allocated weekly](https://earn.mstable.org/#/musd/earn/uniswap-mta-50-weth-50) to incentivize liquidity provision on [our MTA/WETH pair](https://www.notion.so/a7db277d3e0f5e1676325e75f3340455) on Uniswap v2, and this motion seeks to put to a public vote to repurpose these rewards into an actively managed v3 position by [Visor Finance](https://www.visor.finance/) with the same weekly amounts allocated instead to their MTA/ETH [Hypervisor](https://medium.com/visorfinance/how-does-visor-integrate-with-uniswap-v3-f8a648d343ad). This will keep the MTA tokens custodied by the mStableDAO, whilst also providing trading fees that will be a source of income into perpetuity. 

Over time, this 5k weekly emission will accrue to a large pool of capital, addressing MTA/ETH liquidity and generating returns from fees. Once a sufficient amount of liquidity has been established, the reward can then be repurposed to "higher" goals for the mStable protocol.

**Should this motion be brought forward and shared as a public proposal on the mStable forum and snapshot page?**
author: 0x908DB31Ce01DC42c8B712f9156E969bc65023119
